Project in 2009 Waymo has been focused on building the Worlds Most Experienced Driver in hopes of improving the worlds access to mobility while saving thousands of lives now lost to traffic crashes Our Waymo Driver powers Waymo One our fully autonomous ridehailing service as well as Waymo Via our trucking and local delivery service To date Waymo has driven over 20 million miles autonomously on public roads across 25 US cities and conducted over 20 billion miles of simulation testingltbrgtltbrgtSoftware Engineering builds the brains of Waymos fully autonomous driving technology Our software
